title: BestVouch.com
author: BestVouch.com
created_time: August 21, 2022, 05:23:25 PMLast edit: August 22, 2022, 02:03:54 PM by BestVouch.com
content: Welcome to BestVouch.comBEST Casino Bonuses, FREE Rewards and More. ‚ù§üëçBestVouch.com is for players, by players.üèÜüéâüéáWe aim to bring the best experience to our customers with:1Ô∏è‚É£Exclusive and unique bonuses.2Ô∏è‚É£If you have registered using one of our links on BestVouch.com, we can use our experience to help you with complaints against a casino, and we will support you should further action be necessary.üö©3Ô∏è‚É£We provide you with a lossback at certain casinos.üçÄ4Ô∏è‚É£The lossback will be paid in addition to and independently of the already existing casino reward system.ü§ë5Ô∏è‚É£We host weekly and monthly Tournaments on Twitter, where you can win cash prizes.üíöüí∞üèÅ6Ô∏è‚É£We reward active players with special loyalty bonuses.üéÅüì´Our Service is completely new, and we're aiming to bring the best experience to our users with special benefits.‚ù§We will add a FAQ to our website soon.üìÜAll relevant links:http://www.bestvouch.com/https://twitter.com/bestvouch

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: very useful information, are you officially working with the gambling site that you promote on your website?if that is true then you will be very helpful if anyone is having problems what if not ?

comments.author: BestVouch.com
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on August 21, 2022, 06:13:42 PMvery useful information, are you officially working with the gambling site that you promote on your website?if that is true then you will be very helpful if anyone is having problems what if not ?Each casino is handpicked. If a player has any issues (e.g. withdrawal/KYC issues), he can contact us, and we will directly contact the casino management to find a solution here based on the evidence he provides.We act here as a kind of voluntary arbitrator.And no, we do not "officially" work with the casinos (I'm assuming from the question that we are paid directly by the casinos to represent them on the site. Which we are not)

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: First, I would like to welcome you here in the forum and it looks like this can be a potential site but I‚Äôm just wondering since this is just a new site, why claim to be the #1 gambling site that gives a lot of bonuses? I can see the list are very attractive but claiming it already as the top site I guess is quiet an overhype. Well, will look more for the details of this site before trying the platform, I also hope to see real reviews from those who already tried this platform.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: I‚Äôm quiet curious about the services you are offering, I don‚Äôt know if this is a review site that helps gamblers or this is a gambling site as well with the common games available. Wondering if KYC is still needed on this site and what cryptocurrency is accepted here? Any idea as well the fairness and the speed on withdrawal and deposit? If you are just aiming to help gamblers, do we need to provide personal details? So many questions honestly.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: It's not that I don't trust the word you say but can we get a vouch or a confirmation from any of the long-time casinos from this forum that are listed on the site about the part where they said this,Quote from: BestVouch.com on August 21, 2022, 05:23:25 PM2Ô∏è‚É£When a problem with the casino occurs, BestVouch.com is there to support you as an intermediary with a direct line to the casino administration.üö©From the site,QuoteIf you have registered using one of our links, we can help you with a direct line to the casino's management if a problem arises.- 500 Casino- Gamdom- Duelbits- Stake- RollbitHow many cases have you solved prior to setting up this service? comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on August 21, 2022, 06:13:42 PMvery useful information, are you officially working with the gambling site that you promote on your website?if that is true then you will be very helpful if anyone is having problems what if not ?They have to prove that first, they claimed QuoteIf you have registered using one of our links, we can help you with a direct line to the casino's management if a problem arises. So how are you going to do that and do you have one issue that you helped resolved I don't see any testimonials, these are just words to entice people to join your link, I prefer doing it through independent review not just posted links in a site with a makeup promise.

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: Quote from: BestVouch.com on August 21, 2022, 06:21:18 PMQuote from: Blowon on August 21, 2022, 06:13:42 PMvery useful information, are you officially working with the gambling site that you promote on your website?if that is true then you will be very helpful if anyone is having problems what if not ?Each casino is handpicked. If a player has any issues (e.g. withdrawal/KYC issues), he can contact us, and we will directly contact the casino management to find a solution here based on the evidence he provides.We act here as a kind of voluntary arbitrator.And no, we do not "officially" work with the casinos (I'm assuming from the question that we are paid directly by the casinos to represent them on the site. Which we are not)Everyone can make like this, and act like an official by listing the famous website here. but it does not make a chance to bigger than the list. In my experience this only makes you get a lot of referrals. And if you are lucky, and know you are successfully promoting the site, you will get a few tips like a free spin and a deposit bonus. About your responsibility, I think it's not necessary because if anyone complains, you will get it too.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Under the category "crypto casinos" I do see some casinos that I have never heard before. They are CSGO Empire, CSGORoll, DatDrop and HyperDrop. I havent checked them one by one but it seems that they are all CSGO casino. I'm not a fan of CSGO so I'll just skip it and I think it is better if you focus on crypto casinos that you can find in this forum and with good reputation. I know it is just like an affiliate website where your main purpose is to gain referrals so you can earn affiliate commission. Do you offer something more or extra reward for those who register with your link?

comments.body: Quote from: BestVouch.com on August 21, 2022, 06:21:18 PMQuote from: Blowon on August 21, 2022, 06:13:42 PMvery useful information, are you officially working with the gambling site that you promote on your website?if that is true then you will be very helpful if anyone is having problems what if not ?Each casino is handpicked. comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: If I understood correctly, the requirement to receive support from you is to register an account using the referral links posted on your website. But what if I already have an account on a particular casino? Will you not help me through your contacts with the casino management because I didn't register via your referral link? If I have an issue with a casino, how greater are my chances that you will resolve them compared to going through the normal channels via casino support?I would like to see some legitimate feedback from users who you have helped and how you helped them.
